programme.title: MeteoHeroes S1
programme.desc: Fulmen, Nix, Nubes, Pluvia, Thermo and Ventum are six children who discover they have superpowers that involve weather phenomena. They also learn how they can use these to affect nature. Guided by CEM and the AI character Tempus they soon learn how to control their powers and use them wisely to solve small and big issues throughout our planet. On their way to becoming superheroes the kids will also face other dynamics that are typical of their age such as friendship, relations with elders etc.

programme.title: The Great Warrior Wall
programme.desc: This exciting series follows the life of Seya Wolf on his quest to become a hero. On his way, he encounters friends that accompany him on his journey, and foes who force him into battles.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series S25
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: Iz turns to his genius best friend Sanjay, to help him work out why he suddenly has an imaginary friend. With the stresses of exams, bullies, girls, his mum no wonder he's seeing things. When Bonmasher helps Iz stand up to his bullies, they think that's all he was around for. Or was he?

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S29
programme.desc: When an army of powerful alien beings are unleashed on Earth, threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the pre-historic power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven Ares
programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: A cat named Blanket lives in the city with his son, Cape. One day, Cape decides to leave home and embarks on an adventure to find the legendary cat's paradise. To find his son, Blanket must overcome his fear and reconcile with his past.

programme.title: Wild Wild Wow S2

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.

programme.desc: 韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 双重人生

programme.title: 纱丽迷情

programme.title: Kerana Dia Suka
programme.desc: Series SynopsisWardina is hurt when her fiance Sufian is caught red-handed with another woman. She goes on a vacation to mend her broken heart. She meets Idham and feels comfortable around him, even though he is already engaged to someone else. Despite her feelings for him, she decides to leave him as she does not want to become the third party in his relationship. Later, Idham searches for Wardina as he believes she is the one for him. Ep1Wardina is busy planning for her wedding with Su.

programme.title: Masih Ada Rindu
programme.desc: Nasha kidnaps Adam and hides him with the help of her mother. Imran apologises to Hadi as he believes that he is the cause of Nasha's behaviour.

programme.title: Sentuhan Harapan
programme.desc: Agent Orange is a deadly chemical used by the US Army against the communists during the Vietnam War. However, the constant exposure to this chemical resulted in many complex health problems such as physical deformities and mental illnesses. Till today, Agent Orange continues to haunt the descendants of many Vietnamese war veterans, subjecting them to a whole life of sufferings.

programme.title: Aku Titipkan Cinta

The accident causes Khanza to lose her memory and kills Zaki's mother, who is driving the car. Khanza, who loses her memory, is a key witness to the car accident. It turns out a mysterious man has planned to eliminate both of them. Zaki and Khanza meet again when Zaki tries to drive out Khanza from her home factory.
